Please edit the flow input before uploading to the tool. Due to the limited capacity in server, the tool only supports 1 realization. If you need more powerful version, please reach out to me. 

## Step 1. Pre-treatment

Only keep one sheet in flow input files. For example, only keep "R01" in both base case and application case. 

## Step 2. Upload the base- and application-case waste rock
Upload the flow input files to base case and application case

## Step 3. Enter realization i

If you keep "R01" in the input files, please enter 1. If the i is inconsistent with the input file, the tool can't return the results. 

## Step 4. Enter range of data

Enter the range of data in both Excel sheet. 

## Step 5. Enter the tolerance

Please enter the comparison tolerance.
